description:
- Koichi can`t study because his younger brother Soichi is constantly making noise.
- Tormented by his dreams, Yuji asks his friend Mari to keep him awake.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Four x Four Walls / The Sandman`s Lair
Pokoj se čtyřvrstvými zdmi / Doupě spánkového démona
Shijuu Kabe no Heya / Suima no Heya
四重壁の部屋 / 睡魔の部屋
